attack.png, parry.png, dodge.png all generated using https://inkpx.com/word-art-generator

hp_bar.png, stamina_bar.png and enemy_hp_bar.png all utilize default textures from Gimp.
https://www.gimp.org/.

hp_bar.png and stamina_bar.png utilize Graip Runic fron by David Kerkhoff. License and info contained in this directory.
